description: I’m going to keep this short and blunt....... Celebrities hate looking at themselves in the mirrors because once you’ve sold your soul, all you see is demons when you look at yourself. They don’t see themselves when they look into the mirror. I’ve talked to a few people in the industry who have told me this and took pictures of themselves and literally said that it wasn’t them they were looking at. I put out 100 percent Superb Facts in every post and whether you want to believe it or not, it’s TRUE! #hollyweirdisevil
